DOC.brief_summary: To document practices in Canadian ICD implant centres around defibrillation therapy efficacy testing.
DOC.brief_title: Canadian Registry of ICD Implant Testing Procedures
DOC.detailed_description: To document types of defibrillation testing (DFT) procedures are in current use in Canada, rates of use an dno use of DFT testing, medical indications for non use of DFT testing, rate of successful testing of first lead configuration, rates and types of complications from DFT testing, costs of implant procedures and the costs associated with DFT testing, short term outcomes of patients with different types of implant procedures.
DOC.criteria: Receiving a Guidant ICD system, including replacements New epicardial lead(s) implanted, included in another cardiovascular trial (may be in the ELECTION Study)
